data.name: Brave Tales
data.detailed_description:
Brave Tales is an isometric action metroidvania where you explore the vast world of Slavic mythology and your story decisions can alter your world and reshape your destiny. You play as Kolya, who is the only one to save the village from pure evil.

Once upon a time, there was a boy named Kolya, a simple peasant who lived his life in the countryside but became the Chosen One. The time has come: the forces of evil have attacked and destroyed many villages. Ghouls, vampires and monsters frighten people and destroy everything in their path. They want to conquer the ancient Slavic world and turn it into the Realm of the Dead. The king and princes are terrified. It's your destiny now to become the savior or...if your karma let you do it.

And remember…your decisions define your destiny!


The game is set in ancient Slavic world in X century when the king of Kiev decided to convert the faith of the whole country. Gods were not pleased with it and gathered together to wake up evil troops. Perun sent devils, vampires, ghouls on villages. Many were burnt to the ground, the earth flesh collapsed and more monsters came out of hell.
Fortunately, you play as a boy named Kolya who had secret magic powers. Your destiny is to defend Slavic world and defeat ancient Gods. Explore the villages, find secrets, unlock magic abilities and solve God's riddles.


  • Spirit of Slavic fairy tales and mythology

  • Colorful and unique Slavic characters
  • A system of karma that changes because of your actions
  • Card system which will make each run different

  • A world with different biomes
  • Hidden paths, abandoned villages, and a lot of secrets

    Magical scrolls! Collect magical scrolls throughout your journey to tune your abilities and give you advantages or disadvantages in gameplay. This mechanic brings you with random effects to add more fun in your battle.
